title: Nehru's Tryst with Destiny
description: A quick win: understand Nehru's Tryst with Destiny.

hook.text: At midnight on August 14, 1947, Jawaharlal Nehru spoke as India became free after two centuries of British rule.

discovery.text: The speech balanced joy with responsibility, celebrating freedom while warning that the hardest work lay ahead.

twist.text: Hours later, partition violence erupted. The speech's hope clashed with the reality of a divided subcontinent.

climax.text: Nehru's words captured the highest aspiration of independence â€” even as the cost became painfully clear.

punchline.text: Freedom arrived at midnight. So did its consequences.
